title: iravun paghalum
sahitya:
iravum paghalum un sharaNAlayap-paNiyil irundiDum varam taruvAi


anupallavi

  taruNa mazhai pOl en dAgham taNikka vanda dAsar dayAnidhiyE shAnta guNapatiyE


caraNam    tanjam pughundavar nenjak-kavalai tIrkkum samaya sanjIviyAvAi
panca ghOshAtIta parama turiya nilai pArkka tuNai purivAi
anjam adakki ennuL arivAyirundiDum Anandam tandaruL jnAna shikhAmaNiyE
